intro.title: ShelterSearch
intro.paragraph1: Ah, welcome, heroes! I'm Bosai-Sensei, your disaster-preparedness guide. A powerful hurricane is approaching Koto City--and our beloved mascot, Koto-chan, has taken shelter somewhere safe... but we've lost contact!
intro.paragraph2: Your mission is to help me locate which shelter Koto-chan is in before the storm arrives. To do that, you'll need to explore the city, complete disaster-preparedness challenges, and collect clues.
intro.paragraph3: Each correct answer brings us one step closer to Koto-chan--and helps you learn how to stay safe during real emergencies! Ready your team, check your surroundings, and remember: preparedness is the best superpower!

help.title: How to Play
help.subtitle: Master the art of urban deduction
help.overviewBody: A hurricane is approaching! Your team must find the secret emergency shelter hidden in the city. Visit various locations, answer trivia questions about disaster preparedness, and collect clues to deduce which shelter is the secret one. The first team to find it wins!

steps.visitDesc: Move around the city to visit Points of Interest (POIs) marked on the map.
steps.answerDesc: When near a POI, ask questions and answer trivia challenges to unlock clues.
steps.collectDesc: Use correct answers to gather clues about the secret shelter's location and characteristics.
steps.findDesc: Use your clues to deduce which shelter is the secret one, then visit it to win!

tips.greenRed: Green clues tell you what the shelter HAS, red clues tell you what it DOESN'T have
tips.cooldown: Wrong trivia answers lock that question for 2 minutes - answer carefully!
tips.visitPoi: Visit different types of POIs to unlock more question categories
tips.oneGuess: You only get ONE guess - make sure you're confident before submitting!
tips.teamwork: Work with your team to cover more ground and share clues
